faults.name: No hot water
faults.troubleshooting: Check boiler pressure and reset the boiler if necessary.

faults.name: Boiler leaking
faults.troubleshooting: Turn off boiler and isolate any leaking valves or pipes.

faults.name: Not heating up
faults.troubleshooting: Bleed the radiator using a radiator key.

faults.name: Blocked
faults.troubleshooting: Try using a plunger and ensure no foreign objects are blocking the toilet.
